thread.title: Former Manchester United star Wes Brown has backed Paul Pogba to come good for the Red Devils after struggling to justify his world record transfer fee

author: sstreet
title: Former Manchester United star Wes Brown has backed Paul Pogba to come good for the Red Devils after struggling to justify his world record transfer fee
text:
EFL 'He will produce' Former Manchester United star Wes Brown has backed Paul Pogba to come good for the Red Devils after struggling to justify his world record transfer fee 
The French midfielder joined from Juventus in the summer for Â£89million, but has failed to set the Premier League alight By Jake Lambourne
